sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Box, Typography, Link, Grid, Divider, TextField, Button } from '@mui/material'; import { styled } from '@mui/system'; import baaMbooLogo from '../assets/mainlogo1.png'; const PageContainer = styled(Box)(({ theme }) => ({ maxWidth: '1440px', width: '100%', margin: '0 auto', padding: { xs: '0 10px', sm: '0 20px', md: '0 40px' }, })); const StyledFooter = styled(Box)(({ theme }) => ({ backgroundColor: '#000000', color: '#ffffff', padding: { xs: '40px 0', sm: '60px 0' }, bottom: 0, position: 'relative', })); const FooterLink = styled(Link)(({ theme }) => ({ color: '#d3d3d3', textDecoration: 'none', fontSize: { xs: '0.9rem', sm: '1rem' }, transition: 'color 0.3s ease, transform 0.2s ease', '&:hover': { color: '#28b463', transform: 'translateX(5px)', }, })); const FooterSectionTitle = styled(Typography)(({ theme }) => ({ color: '#ffffff', fontWeight: 'bold', marginBottom: '20px', fontSize: { xs: '1.1rem', sm: '1.25rem' }, position: 'relative', '&:after': { content: '""', position: 'absolute', width: '50px', height: '2px', backgroundColor: '#28b463', bottom: '-5px', left: 0, }, })); const SocialIcon = styled(Link)(({ theme }) => ({ color: '#ffffff', margin: { xs: '0 8px', sm: '0 12px' }, fontSize: { xs: '1.5rem', sm: '1.8rem' }, transition: 'color 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease', '&:hover': { color: '#28b463', transform: 'scale(1.2)', }, })); const LogoImage = styled('img')(({ theme }) => ({ height: { xs: '40px', sm: '50px' }, width: { xs: '180px', sm: '220px' }, marginBottom: '20px', })); const NewsletterInput = styled(TextField)(({ theme }) => ({ '& .MuiInputBase-root': { backgroundColor: '#ffffff', borderRadius: '4px', padding: '5px', }, '& .MuiInputBase-input': { color: '#000000', fontSize: { xs: '0.9rem', sm: '1rem' }, }, width: { xs: '100%', sm: 'auto' }, // Full width on small screens })); const SubscribeButton = styled(Button)(({ theme }) => ({ backgroundColor: '#28b463', color: '#ffffff', padding: { xs: '8px 20px', sm: '10px 25px' }, borderRadius: '4px', fontSize: { xs: '0.9rem', sm: '1rem' }, transition: 'backgroundColor 0.3s ease, transform 0.2s ease', '&:hover': { backgroundColor: '#229954', transform: 'scale(1.05)', }, })); const Footer = () => { return ( Premium Oversized Tees for Men & Women Crafted with 100% premium cotton for ultimate comfort and durability. Nationwide Cash on Delivery | Free Shipping on Orders Above ₹999 Navigation Home Shop Collections About Us Blog Customer Support Contact Us FAQ Returns & Refunds Shipping Policy support@baamboo.com Legal Privacy Policy Terms of Service Cookie Policy Disclaimer Connect With Us Join our community for exclusive offers and updates. Call us: +91 98765 43210 Stay in the Loop Subscribe to our newsletter for exclusive deals, style tips, and early access to new collections. Subscribe We Accept: Visa, Mastercard, PayPal, UPI, Cash on Delivery © 2025 Baa M Boo. All rights reserved. | Designed with{' '} ♥ in India ); }; export default Footer;
